skills.label: Choose data access technologies
items: Choose a data access technology, including ado.net, entity framework, wcf data services, and azure cosmos db, based on application requirements

skills.label: Implement caching
items: Cache static data, apply cache policies, including policy expirations
Use cachedependency to refresh cache data
Query notifications
Implement caching using redis

skills.label: Implement transactions
items: Manage transactions by using the api from system.transactions namespace
Implement distributed transactions including distributed transaction on sql azure
Specify a transaction isolation level

skills.label: Implement data storage in Microsoft Azure
items: Access data storage in windows azure
Choose a data storage mechanism in microsoft azure. including blobs, tables, queues, azure sql, and cosmos db
Distribute data by using the content delivery network (cdn) and azure file sync
Handle exceptions by using retries
Use elastic client library with azure sql

skills.label: Create and implement a WCF Data Services service
items: Address resources
Implement filtering
Create a query expression
Access payload formats, including json
Use data service interceptors and service operators
Version a data service
Implement data services providers
Host the dataservice
Use actions to implement server-side behavior

label: Querying and Manipulating Data by Using the Entity Framework (20-25%)

skills.label: Query and manipulate data by using the Entity Framework
items: Query, update, and delete data by using dbcontext
Build a query that uses deferred execution
Implement lazy loading and eager loading
Create and run compiled queries
Query data by using entity sql
Create global query filters

skills.label: Query and manipulate data by using Data Provider for Entity Framework
items: Query and manipulate data by using connection, datareader, and command objects from the system.data.entityclient namespace
Perform synchronous and asynchronous operations
Manage transactions (api)

skills.label: Query data by using LINQ to Entities
items: Query data by using linq operators, including project, skip, aggregate, filter, and join
Log queries
Implement query boundaries

skills.label: Query and manipulate data by using ADO.NET
items: Query and manipulate data by using connection, datareader, and command objects
Perform synchronous and asynchronous operations
Manage transactions

skills.label: Create an Entity Framework data model
items: Structure a data model using table per type, table per class, and table per hierarchy
Select and implement an approach to manage a data model, including code first, model first, and database first
Implement poco objects
Describe a data model by using conceptual schema definitions, storage schema definitions, and mapping languages, including csdl, ssdl, and msl

skills.label: Implement Entity Framework with third party databases
items: Implement entity framework using mysql and sqlite databases
Design a strategy to manage differences between database capabilities
Leverage database specific technologies, including on duplicate key using entity framework

label: Creating and Consuming Web API-based services (20-25%)

skills.label: Design a Web API
items: Define http resources with http actions
Plan appropriate uri space, and map uri space using routing
Choose appropriate http method to meet requirements
Choose appropriate web api formats for responses to meet requirements
Plan when to make http actions asynchronous

skills.label: Implement a Web API
items: Accept data in json format
Use content negotiation to deliver different data formats to clients
Define actions and parameters to handle data binding
Implement dependency injection to create more flexible applications
Implement action filters and exception filters to manage controller execution
Implement asynchronous and synchronous actions
Implement streaming actions
Implement middleware

skills.label: Secure a Web API
items: Implement identity for authentication
Implement authorization using roles, claims, and custom authorization
Implement data protection apis
Enable cross-domain requests (cors)
Prevent cross-site request forgery (xsrf)
Implement and extend authorization filters to control access to applications

skills.label: Host and manage Web API
items: Host web api in iis
Self-host a web api in your own process
Host web api in kestrel
Host services in a windows azure web app
Host services in docker containers
Configure the host server for streaming
Work with a hosting environment

skills.label: Consume Web API web services
items: Consume web api services by using httpclient
Send and receive requests in different formats
Handle retry logic
Implement content negotiation
Use swagger to construct uris and payloads
Use autorest to build clients

skills.label: Consume a WCF service
items: Generate proxies by using svcutil
Generate proxies by creating a service reference
Create and implement channel factories
Configure wcf services by using configuration settings
Create and configure bindings for wcf services
Relay bindings to azure using service bus endpoints
Integrate with the azure service bus relay

skills.label: Implement serverless Azure Web Services
items: Host web services using app services, including logic apps and api apps
Design and implement azure function based services
Design and implement azure web jobs
Design and implement service fabric based web services
Implement schedule-based processing in a serverless environment

skills.label: Implement traffic management in Azure
items: Implement azure load balancer, including scaling
Implement azure application gateway
Implement azure traffic manager
Design for multiple regions
Leverage azure cdn for caching web services
Implement log analytics

skills.label: Implement Azure API Management
items: Secure web services using certificates, azure active directory, and oauth
Define and implement policies, including secrets, caching, external services, monitoring and throttling
Define api interface using the azure portal and swagger
Manage running services using logging, disaster recovery, and multiple regions

skills.label: Monitor web services
items: Collect logs and metrics using azure event hubs
Process logs and metrics using azure event hubs, stream analytics, and machine learning
Use azure app insights to monitor and troubleshoot web services

Deploy using web publishing in visual studio
Deploy a web application by using xcopy
Automate a deployment from vsts or tfs build server

Create staging environments

Specify operating system configuration
